snippet: Mr. Hopkins, who worked on the “Lord of the Rings” trilogy and other Peter Jackson films, drowned Sunday in a rafting accident in New Zealand.
abstract: Mike Hopkins, Oscar-winning sound editor, dies at age 53.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hopkins, who worked on the “Lord of the Rings” trilogy and other Peter Jackson films, drowned Sunday in a rafting accident in New Zealand.

headline.seo: Mike Hopkins, 53, a Sound Editor for ‘Rings’ Trilogy, Dies
headline.main: Mike Hopkins, Oscar-Winning Sound Editor, Dies at 53
